#F2C01C#Yeah, but it was my system, and you were messing with my paycheck!#REVERT#
#F2C01C#You wouldn't believe what I found in those computers. Heh heh (huuuuurk).#REVERT#
#F2C01C#Wanna know why you're stuck huck-uck-uck...uh. Here? I saw the logs.#REVERT#
#F2C01C#A guy named Ka-kack-hack-apsi got tired of paying for all the stuff you kept blowing up!#REVERT#
#F2C01C#Sonofa... Commander Kapsi! That cheap bastard. Never did like my expense reports.#REVERT#
#F2C01C#Tell you what, Rakk. We get out of here, we'll get Kapsi's payroll together.#REVERT#
#F2C01C#Stupid BLU guy! Drill too deep and we end up here!#REVERT#
#F2C01C#Now calm down little feller. They got Hyperium and Adamantium...#REVERT#
#F2C01C#Ja. They must have Australium. It is scientific logic!#REVERT#
#F2C01C#Is weird. Why we teaming up? No robots here. Only strange bugs.#REVERT#
#F2C01C#I'm kinda missing good ol' Demoman. He'd clean up right quick.#REVERT#
#F2C01C#Y'all got some meds for your pal? She makes me a bit antsy. #REVERT#
#F2C01C#Or he makes me antsy... or... whatever. #REVERT#
#F2C01C#Zis Australium. Its form can be any form, like gold, even. Ja?#REVERT#
#F2C01C#Like Dust?? Nut boy is sounding saner and saner.#REVERT#
#F2C01C#You watch tongue. Nut boy's friend is watching you Or... nut girl? Hmmm...#REVERT#
#F2C01C#So. We find Australium. Or we find Dust. And we go back and kill robots. Yes?#REVERT#
#F2C01C#All these things would be easier with that little Scout to go find it.#REVERT#
#F2C01C#But, ach, I am getting very tired of his baseball trivia.#REVERT#
#F2C01C#Yes! I have filled my bags with Dust!#REVERT#
#F2C01C#Heavy Guy too! I mean, my bags with Dust. Not yours.#REVERT#
#F2C01C#Same here I'm thinking we're fixing to do some serious damage here.#REVERT#
#F2C01C#Ja! Ah ha haa! Uh, if we live...#REVERT#
Anybody see any restrooms on the way?
Right now, if a monster offers me a chocolate bar I will let it kill me.
I haven't had this much fun in an elevator since that pallet of lubricant... ah, forget it.
Hold on. Is this Tuesday? No, it's...
You know what's great about this elevator?
Elevators used to be boring. Now I love them.
They don't try to eat me.
Why is everything in this place busted except the elevator?
Weird question, but why does this elevator only have one button?
Haven't killed anything for a few minutes.
I used to think: "Poor monsters. They have families."
Now I want to kill the family, too.
These monsters - are they more skulking, or slinking?
I'm sure we'll be out of here in no time!
Whoever built this place had weird taste in house pets.
Okay, that dentist's visit is now the *second* worst experience of my life.
When my mom said "life is struggle," is this what she meant?
And I thought dinner with the in-laws was long and painful.
I had a bad feeling about this. I still have a bad feeling about this.
I will always have a bad feeling about this.
You know, it didn't look like this at all on the brochures.
And to top it all off, now I'm getting a blister.
Or, uh, slightly less putrid air?
Could be a slight breeze, or a wild hallucination.
At least this elevator doesn't have the traditional music.
Is that a bird call, or the shriek of something getting eaten?
On the bright side, funeral expenses were low.
Shall we say a prayer for the fallen, or for ourselves?
And I was just starting to like that guy.
Or at least hate them less.
Now I know what Brazil feels like.
There's a lot of dungeon left, and not many of us.
Now would be a good time to find religion.
Look at it this way: we redecorated that level in red.
We're always looking for fresh cannon fodder.
How about if the newbie takes point?
I'm glad we have a new recruit.
Now I can give orders to someone.
Our tradition is the new guy on the team takes all the blame for failures.
I don't even have anyone to yell at.
No one to blame for mistakes.
At least nobody will complain if I start singing.
So what if I'm alone! I can play solitaire.
Stupid elevator doesn't even give us background exposition.
Whoever is humming that song, stop or I kill you.
Any of you guys know the words to "Frzt krdjk munk"? No? Okay, it goes like this- oh. Too late.
Sorry in advance if I flip into a psychotic rage.
Check the buttons. Is there a floor: "Safe Zone Full of Hot Chicks"?
You know, if there were four of us, we could sing some great quartet stuff.
Four of us could do some great beach volleyball down here.
I did not come this far to die poor!
I can smell the artifacts... crystal skulls, jade idols, gold jewelry...
Come on, dungeon. Make Max rich! Now, if possible.
In we go. Too late for second thoughts!
Line your necks up, monsters. I just sharpened my sword.
First come, first served up as hamburger!
Gork is here! Time to die!
I am Gork! You are Gork's target practice!
I don't see why humans so enjoy exploration.
At least we could stop and dissect the remains. For science, of course.
Wish the keyholes were a little lower...
Watch out. Dangerous things come in small packages.
This is what I train for.
I await the challenge with calm and concentration.
Nothing in there can weaken my will or my honor.
EVERYBODY QUIET! I'M OPENING THE DOOR!
I HOPE YOUR INSURANCE IS PAID UP! HERE WE GO!
Ready! Both wit and weapon are razor-sharp.
And then, as I open the door... Strike home!
The most beautiful moments in life are lived with sword in hand.
You call that a lock? Ha! Huh... Hrrk ack ack!
Ooo! Maybe there's something awful waiting!
I just get so excited at moments like this.
Another door! More monsters! It's like every moment is my birthday.
Hurry everybody! Maybe we can get hurt again.
Ridiculous, this manual labor for a person of my elevatored intelligence.
Don't want Dust or loot. Just bugs.
I can hear 'em clacking in there... Lunch time!
Door's opening. I get all the crunchy bits!
Some day, one of these will lead to an exit.
When mother said "Life is repetition and struggle", I doubt she had this in mind.
Part of me still thinks it's rude to do this without knocking first.
I wonder who we're going to meet...
Monsters worry me a lot less than survivors.
Kicking doors and kicking ass. Is this heaven, or what?
Just get me a big enough can opener.
Ready to see what kitchen cutlery can do in trained hands?
Hey monsters! Would you rather be chopped, diced, or minced?
I'm tired of this. THIS IS BATTLE AND GLORY! And I'm tired of you.
I must not let the treasures be corrupted by these oafs.
Enemies on all sides, and none who care for our heritage.
Behind each door lost tales and remnants of civilization...
I open, I learn, I remember.
Whatever's on the other side is about to become allergic to wrenches.
Y'all ready to make some bacon?
Ho ho ho! Heavy Guy is coming!
With all the tech in this place, one of these rooms must have a decent sound system.
The signals I'm picking up don't qualify as music. They're not even 'noise'.
It's not so bad. I've been in nightclubs worse than this...
Anything worth building is worth re-building. Here I come!
I don't need a license to kill, I have one to operate heavy machinery.
It's not destruction, it's de-construction. Entirely different.
Anybody need whipping into shape? I got the whip to do it.
I'll open every door until I find my dog. Then I'll beat it for getting lost.
You might not want to look. This is where training gets ugly.
Ready for a faceful of enlightenment?
Hey! Leave me alone. I just want loot!
Uh! Not the first time, not the last...
This is the tough part of the job.
As long as I can keep giving it, I don't mind taking it.
Ow! Now you make Gork angry!
Gork loves this part! Everybody bleeds, Gork lives!
Damage! I need pliers and a hammer.
Idiot! It's not like spare parts are easy to come by.
Hey! Okay, now I'm really pissed.
Ow! Watch it. I'm a lotta mean in a little package.
Thank you for that scar of honor!
I fear neither wounds, nor death. That is why I am free.
THIS IS SUPPOSED TO HAPPEN TO OTHER PEOPLE!
My body's not wounded. Just my pride.
How can I get wounded? My guard is impenetrable!
That's nothing. It hurts more when I cough.
Next time hit the lungs. They're rock hard.
That hurt pretty bad. What a rush!
Huh! Superficial damage to the outer perihelion.
Bah! It's nothing. Slight contusion to the lemur.
So what? Still got seven other legs.
I will not be buried here!
You killed my steed, but you will not have me!
He shanked me! I mean, uh, I'm wounded!
You trying to make friends with that little love tap?
I've had worse from a cheese grater.
So what? You see a lot of blood in the kitchens.
PAIN MEANS I AM ALIVE! No, it means you're hurt, idiot.
Ay! That hurt! SILENCE, WEAK ONE. REVEL IN IT! ...psychopath...
REND MY FLESH; I SHALL NOT WEAKEN! Big words. It's not your flesh!
Unimportant. The body is not eternal.
Ouch! Didn't see that coming. Spy...?
Just cause I can take it like a man don't mean I like to...
Not supposed to go like this...
I am about to get über-angry.
Don't pick on me. I'm just tech support!
If I'm going to die, can I at least get a decent soundtrack for it?
Ow! Who dinged the paint job?
If I minded getting scraped up I wouldn't have taken the job.
Somebody's about to have an extreme weight loss experience!
I've been bitten! Wait, no, wrong word... Wounded!
You touch the sergeant, you learn pain.
No! It'll take hours to polish that out.
Oh man. This is gonna get ugly.
Max, why are you doing this? Maax....
Step 1: Remove. Step 2: All hell breaks loose.
Out of my way, boys. If I can't go around you I'll go through you!
Clear me a path, and get ready for the tough part!
Not heavy. Maybe Gork stick it in pocket.
Right. This sounds like a GREAT idea.
Sure, give the big job to the little guy. Bastards.
Freaking thing is almost bigger than I am.
Very funny. "Make Troe do it; he's the smallest target."
I GOT THE CRYSTAL! LET'S SNEAK IT OUT!
I got the crrrrr-hack! The crih... crys-urk! The... forget it.
I have the crystal! Come and attack me!
Yoo hoo, monsters! It's right here!
Technically speaking it's not actually a crystal...
I bet the bugs'll be coming out of the walls for this...
Best bug bait I ever heard of. This is gonna be great!
It is no greater weight than duty and honor.
I hate being the center of attention.
Lock and load, girls! Crystal coming through!
This is great. All the butts that need kicking come right for you!
Bah. I've carried stewpots heavier than this.
This isn't heavy. A full unboned Groit oxen carcass? That's heavy.
This thing is heavy - SUCH POWER! - oh, shut up.
This could power the archives for years...
I cannot let the destroyers take a thing of such power!
Simple and brutish technology, but too valuable to leave behind.
A poor use of skilled resources, partner.
So much power! Ah ha ha haaaaa! ... Uh, not that I crave power... much...
I should have left it. It's the only thing down there that works.
It's... it's singing to me... And it's off key.
If I had flattened it first, it'd be easier to carry.
Yeehaaaah! And they pay me to do this!
Don't judge me, but this is the most fun I've ever had.
A well-trained crystal would carry itself...
This would be easier with a dogsled.
This cultural exchange is about to get serious.
Sometimes civilization has to be imposed!
A little luck and a lot of elbow grease...
This is tough. Usually I just fiddle with the "volume" knob until it works again.
A busted module is no good to anybody.
Keep the equipment in working condition, and it does the same for you.
Uh. Maybe it works if Gork hits it enough.
Whoever made this mess wouldn't know a ratchet spanner from a cross-toothed positron vice.
Hey little buddy, let me help you de-arc the field poles. I know how that hurts!
There is no shame in preparation.
As the sword is the soul, the equipment is the body.
Demeaning work for these dextrous limbs.
If I had enough time, I could definitely optimize the output...
Look at this thing! Even alien tech has sloppy designers. Hack-ack ahhhhh...
I bet it will hurt if I stick my finger there...
Wow, look at all the sharp edges. This is gonna be great!
Humiliating! A mind of such largesse on this simple task.
Hey, every once in a while you need to restring the web.
If you're gonna trap the flies, you gotta prep the web.
One does not go into battle with broken armor.
Heh heh. I always been a bit of a fixer...
I wonder if there's anything I can borrow from this thing...
Time for the duct tape and super glue!
I don't repair stuff. The sous-chefs do that.
I'M A DESTROYER, NOT A REPAIRMAN! No, you're a nuisance...
All things must be conserved, protected, preserved.
Simple things to fix, given the artifacts and materials on hand.
I like to fix things, too.
Heck, I only needed ten PhD's to fix this one.
Sometimes you gotta use more wrench instead.
Grrr... Is more fun to break than fix.
Dead equipment? Boring. I much prefer working on live bodies.
I can't believe how you people treat your equipment.
Of course I can fix it. And of course you'll trash it again.
It's not so bad. I've seen boy bands do worse to nice hotels.
They knock them down, I put them back up.
Am I the only one that thinks this is more fun under gunfire?
Could you fire a few rounds? I work better with a little noise.
There's nothing I can't either raze or repair.
I can fix a module just by yelling at it. Watch me.
Nothing that a crack of the whip won't help.
Oh, these crude little modules. It's like talking to football players.
Of course I can repair this. But it's so boooring.
What a cute little protocol you have. It's almost interesting.
Not just a ship, a living lab of empire creation. Maybe not the ideal cargo, but everything you need to colonize a world - then a galaxy - should be here.
So many puppets, so many strings... And once we've lifted off, who cares if they figure out who was pulling them? No one on the ship will return to Mazen. Our future lies among the stars.
G.P. Weird as hell. Quick. Smart? Mostly hungry.
Primarily known for burglary, infiltration, eating insects
Homicidal professor? Hard to imagine him publishing an academic paper. Or spelling his own name right.
Not as smart as he thinks he is. In fact, not smart at all. What team chooses him as leader?
Note: Superglue augmented string extruder. Not actual spider web.
The Face. Master of disguise. Where did he go? Or is it "she"?
Bunch of misfits. For a criminal gang, more "charming" or "cute" than "effective". Maybe why they're behind bars...
Okay, Mormish? Was the warden in on the gang? Don't remember him like that. Or is it someone else?
Note: Spry for a paraplegic. Would love to get a DNA test. Or pull that mask off.
Not useful as configured. Could use a couple of hacks. Meditation?
Good con man. Good at being conned. Naïve? Or just stupid? Short-tempered.
Lets his blade do the talking. Good idea; blade probably smarter than he is.
Ex-spec ops? Wonder what went wrong. Skilled, sociopathic. Useful.
First time I've seen an android with nervous tics. Weird.
Heavy weapons, heavy attitude. Fast, smart, dangerous.
A cipher. Records scrubbed. By it?
Needs more help than I can give. Useful if contained, in spite of handicaps.
Would not want to be her kid! Or sibling, co-worker, waiter...
Loud, annoying, effective. Classic "unstoppable force." Useful.
Not a real pro; more like a hobbyist. Mormish cutting costs? Probably damaged them both.
Armory - everyone's favorite pod. Eyeing it like kids in a candy store...
Staff, prob'ly refectory. Excellent cleaver skills. Likes bland food! Useful.
Obsession is clear given KM pathology. What a way to get your jollies. Pity the chef.
Everything has equal importance; obsessive. Too bad, useful med skills
Lets his blade do the talking. Good idea; blade is prob'ly smarter.
Infirmary pod, a.k.a. Medical Bay. A pharmacist's fantasy in there...
Psychopath. Sociopath. In a good way. Controllable? If so, very useful. Prob'ly stupid to try...
How old? Still effective. So planet tech should be, too!!
Power source. Highest priority. Sufficient kJ for relaunch!
Revenge, apparently. Rumor puts her family on Kaytuël. Surprised she brought him in alive.
Doesn't look like a mastermind. Prob'ly why she was so good. Until her lungs gave out. Very useful.
Conservative. Defensive. Annoying, but has the teeth to enforce it. Not useful.
Useful for cryo work, storage. Good to keep an eye on it.
Wonder how many agents she needed. And kTons of explosives.
Lives up to her rep. Doubt I can turn her. Too bad.
This one, definitely. She'll do it just to watch the world explode.
Stay away from that blade. Maybe most dangerous native. Not useable; too honest.
Clan honor, but... what clans? Origins? Not Auriga DNA. An old story there...
She's scary obsessed. Almost makes me feel sorry for the bug.
Too many people inside one head. Not sure she's stable. Too bad; nice mix of skills.
Efficient, this one. Knows the place, the planet. Definitely useful, definitely persuadable.
Avian warriors; origin off-planet? Curious structure, physiology. Too dangerous/proud to be usable.
Give us a hug! My ticket to riches.
Note: Check rations, resources. Don't want to be stuck there.
Clever. Dangerous. I like it. Would use it, except it sees me as food.
Possible option for escape? Hopefully not necessary.
Vile snake. Uses paralysis. Want to run away, but can't. Terrifying.
Don't like it. Gruesome, noisy, ugly, hungry. Run away.
WTF magic? Weakens heroes. Kill it with mods (or run away).
No, seriously. Giant, crazed, violent, dangerous. Call themselves Hurna?? Who cares. Run away.
So very ugly. Bet its mother hated it, too. Inflates, then explodes near heroes / mods. Kill it first. Run away.
Still Growing. Boosts other monsters. Take it down!
When it gets this big, start to worry.
Too late! Now it boosts all the monsters on the floor. Get someone else to kill it *fast* while you run away.
Kill it quick! Otherwise it'll bust doors open. Too dangerous to let go. PITA.
"Dungeon Monsters Grp 1: Lab Specimens (?)" Appear to be developed / artificial. Further study.
Fast, distance attack. Keep it away from major mods. Good idea to run away.
Goes fast, hits hard. Goes for crystal. Priority target.
Goes for minor mods. Pain in the neck. Need heroes to take it down.
Hates modules - very annoying. Won't fight back; kill it.
Slow, annoying, swarms, explodes. Run away.
Won't stop biting til it's dead. Run away.
Annoying. Buffs bad guys. High priority target.
Big. Ugly. Mean. Get someone else to kill it.
Weak, annoying. Kill it. Or run away.
Annoying little critter, dies easily. Target practice.
So where do we make a go of it - out here or back down inside? The air isn't all that fresh, but at least you see the monsters coming.

A lot to think about. Old place, advanced tech - almost like magic. Called Auriga, they say. Weird creatures all over, maybe subjects of experiments. Like it's one huge lab. And parts of it are still defended. Lots of danger. Lots of loot. Hmmm...
Hmm. Not sure if they're more dangerous to me, or to each other.
Not sure how that got in... smuggled inside somebody's rib cage?
Good at fixing things. Good at breaking things. Awful taste in music.
Good with guns. With logic? Not so much...
Only useful for projects that require bodies and a pile of cinders at the end.
Not sure that what he does strictly qualifies as medicine.
Strange new species. Look like they were designed by a committee.
Vultu - Likes the dark. Volatile. Good loot, if you're quick.
Virid - Likes modules - a bit too much. Scrape it off fast.
Viscos - Gooey. Ugly. Smelly. Get off my leg!

Maintenance requires high-tannin lubrication, capsicum-laced high-cholesterol proteins, and multi-harmonic, instrumental, arrhythmic sound waves with a high dynamic range. [Note: Kitten photos optional].
Highly skilled. Highly annoying. Unfortunately useful.
Too bad they didn't have a better pilot.
Wouldn't be surprised if she could make rocks heel.
Got style, good taste in music. Dunno about the hair.
Don't let her near anything breakable. At least not accidentally.
As mean and smelly as it looks. Watch that club!
Able to annoy you from anywhere in the room.

Bookworm Add-on
- Adds "The Library" spaceship that unlocks a new mode for the game. - Adds Josh 'Ntello to the hero cast of the game.

Deep-Freeze Add-on
- Adds "The Refreezerator" spaceship that unlocks a new mode for the game. - Adds Kreyang to the hero cast of the game.

Rescue Team Add-on
- Adds Sasha Chokyo, Wes Davoun and Zugma Walker to the hero cast of the game. - Adds 2 Hurnas monsters to the dungeons of the game. - Adds the "Field Medic" Major Module to searchable technologies in the game.
